law.text: These provisions establishing the mine subsidence insurance fund shall not be implemented until federal money is received by the department for administration costs and a reserve. However, the department may take any preliminary action to prepare for implementation when federal money is received.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1572, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984.
